welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kapaa, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches, laid-back atmosphere, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lihue Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Inter-Island Terminal
terminals.description: The inter-island terminal at Lihue Airport serves flights within the Hawaiian Islands.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Port Allen Airport offers a modern and comfortable experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is a smaller terminal at Port Allen Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barking Sands PMRF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Barking Sands PMRF Airport is used for military operations and personnel.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
